Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by Texas in 1982...
Traded from Texas to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P F. Eufemia. Going to TEX: 3B J. Carter)...
Earned first career win on 6/19/1990...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/5/1994 to a 2-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
